text: geudaega nollal geos-i issdamyeon nollaul geos-eun uliga heulg-i doeeoss-eul ttaesillo uliga saelohi changjodoelkka la go malhaneun geudeul-ui yaegila geudeul-eun junim-eul bulsinhan jadeullo geudeul-ui mog e meong-ega chaewojyeo buljiog-ui ju-in deul-i doeeo geugos-eseo yeong-wonhi saneun jadeul-ila
